c.x: First two false alarms: no charge.
Third and fourth false alarm: $50.
Fifth through eighth false alarm: $75.
Ninth and 10th false alarm: $100.
Eleventh through 15th false alarm: $200.
Sixteenth through 20th false alarm: $300.
Twenty-first or more false alarms: $500.
